_A_CAROUSEL_COMPONENT_ALT_SOCCER_BALL_: Soccer ball on a red background
_A_CAROUSEL_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: A carousel is a component for cyclically displaying elements (images, text, etc.) in a limited space. Users can navigate through the elements using navigation buttons or indicators.
_A_CAROUSEL_GROUP_ARIA_DISABLED_DESCRIPT: The carousel component can be marked as disabled for assistive technologies using the aria-disabled attribute.
_A_CAROUSEL_GROUP_ARROWS_TRIGGER_DESCRIP: The carousel component can display navigation arrows in different ways: always visible, only on hover, only on focus, or on both hover and focus.
_A_CAROUSEL_GROUP_INDICATORS_AUTO_LIMIT_: Example of automatic limitation of the number of indicators depending on the carousel width
_A_CAROUSEL_GROUP_INDICATORS_LIMIT_DESCR: Example of limiting the number of displayed indicators
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_ARIA_DISABLED_DESCRIPT: Indicates whether the carousel should be marked as disabled for assistive technologies
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_ARIA_LABEL_DESCRIPTION: Translatable aria-label for the main carousel element
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_ARROW_NEXT_ATTRIBUTES_: Additional attributes for the button that navigates to the next slide and are not explicitly defined as properties
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_ARROW_NEXT_ICON_DESCRI: Name of the icon that is displayed on the button for navigating to the next slide
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_ARROW_PREVIOUS_ATTRIBU: Additional attributes for the button that navigates to the previous slide and are not explicitly defined as properties
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_ARROW_PREVIOUS_ICON_DE: Name of the icon that is displayed on the button for navigating to the previous slide
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_ARROWS_PLACEMENT_DESCR: Determines the placement of navigation buttons relative to the carousel content
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_ARROWS_SHOW_DESCRIPTIO: Determines whether navigation buttons (arrows) should be displayed for navigating between slides
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_ARROWS_TRIGGER_DESCRIP: Determines when navigation buttons should be displayed: always, on hover, or on focus
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_AUTOPLAY_INTERVAL_DESC: Interval in milliseconds between automatic slide transitions
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_AUTOPLAY_SHOW_DESCRIPT: Determines whether autoplay controls should be displayed
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_AUTOPLAY_START_DESCRIP: Determines whether autoplay should start immediately after the component loads
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_DATA_DESCRIPTION_: Array of objects with data to display in the carousel
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_DISABLED_DESCRIPTION_: Determines whether the carousel should be disabled, preventing user interaction
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_ID_DESCRIPTION_: Specifies a unique identifier for the carousel
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_INDICATOR_WIDTH_DESCRI: Size of one indicator, needed to determine the number of indicators if indicatorsAutoLimit true
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_INDICATORS_AUTO_LIMIT_: If true, determines the maximum number of indicators based on the element width, used in conjunction with indicatorWidth
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_INDICATORS_LIMIT_DESCR: Sets the maximum number of indicators
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_INDICATORS_PLACEMENT_D: Determines the placement of slide indicators relative to the carousel content
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_INDICATORS_SHOW_DESCRI: Determines whether slide indicators should be displayed
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_INDICATORS_TYPE_DESCRI: Determines the type of slide indicators
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_KEY_ID_DESCRIPTION_: A unique key identifier for each data item. Used for performance improvement
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_MODEL_VALUE_DESCRIPTIO: Index or ID of the currently active slide in the carousel
_A_CAROUSEL_PROPS_TEXTS_DESCRIPTION_: Object with translatable texts used in the component
